verses.name: Job 41:19
verses.text: Out of his mouth go burning lamps, and sparks of fire leap out.

verses.name: Job 41:20
verses.text: Out of his nostrils goeth smoke, as out of a seething pot or caldron.

verses.name: Job 41:21
verses.text: His breath kindleth coals, and a flame goeth out of his mouth.

verses.name: Job 41:22
verses.text: In his neck remaineth strength, and sorrow is turned into joy before him.

verses.name: Job 41:23
verses.text: The flakes of his flesh are joined together: they are firm in themselves; they cannot be moved.

verses.name: Job 41:24
verses.text: His heart is as firm as a stone; yea, as hard as a piece of the nether millstone.
